paragraph: ACIC-BMU Foundation (ACIC-BMU) is set up by BML Munjal University (BMU) along with the support of Atal Innovation Mission (AIM), NITI Aayog to promote and support innovation and entrepreneurship. It focuses on encouraging innovators within the university and the community around the university.

Services.name: Physical Facilities
Services.text: Furnished office space- coworking and cabin options are available; personal computers (CYOD), telecom facility, internet connectivity, multi-function printer, conference room equipped with projection and tele-presence facilities along with pantry and library resources.

Services.name: Technical Support
Services.text: Helps innovators/startups in the areas of legal services including - IP Protection, patent filing, registration of trademarks, and copyrights etc. along with support in accounting and company secretarial services.

Services.name: Tinkering Space
Services.text: Facilitates the innovators/startups to use Tinkering and Maker Spaces available on BML Munjal Universityâ€™s campus to develop their prototypes and products.

Services.name: Experts & Mentors
Services.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis sed dapibus leo nec ornare diam sedasd commodo nibh ante facilisis bibendum dolor feugiat at.

Services.name: Fund Raising
Services.text: Facilitates applications for grants from government bodies or corporate venture entities. May also consider providing grant, seed fund/ soft loan subject to the availability of funds/ grants/ schemes meant for the same. The startups will be supported through connections with potential investors for fundraising.

Services.name: Industry Connect
Services.text: Meetings of innovators/startups with leaders from industries are organised regularly by ACIC-BMU. Connect with ecosystem players like Investors, successful entrepreneurs, service providers is provided to the startups.

Services.name: Labs & workshops
Services.text: Facilitates the incubatee innovators/startups to access the laboratories and other resources of the university for their development purposes. Incubatees can perform development-related activities at the laboratories.
